title: Lulu Dark Can See Through Walls
description: Lulu Dark is the anti-Nancy—a chic, tough-talking city girl who never meant to get involved in a mystery.But when her favorite purse is stolen during a Many Handsomes concert, Lulu knows she has to get it back. After all, it was one of a kind—and the lead singer's phone number was stashed inside! Lulu dives deep into the fray along with her friends Daisy and Charlie, and discovers a twisted mystery involving a rock star, a rich socialite, a loony landlord, and a serious case of mistaken identity.
author: Bennett Madison
